death.attack.inferno.player: %1$s was dissolved to ash by %2$s's Inferno
death.attack.inferno.item: %1$s was dissolved to ash by %2$s's Inferno using %3$s
enchantment.enchantments_plus.aim.desc: arrows home towards enemies up to %1$s blocks away
increase damage dealt by %1$s from behind the enemy
enchantment.enchantments_plus.blood_thir: increase damage by %1$s for each entity killed in the last %2$s seconds
enchantment.enchantments_plus.bonk.desc: Protects you from §c1§r hit every §c60§r seconds
enchantment.enchantments_plus.chain_ligh: grants a %1$s chance to spawn up to %2$s chain lightnings, that bounce up to %3$s targets and deal %4$s damage of the triggering hit
turns wool obtained from sheep into any color
enchantment.enchantments_plus.combat_kno: Grant's a %1$s chance to instantly kill an enemy on hit
enchantment.enchantments_plus.compacting: compacts dropped items into their ingot or block form
enchantment.enchantments_plus.ender_frie: enderman will no longer target you if you look at them
enchantment.enchantments_plus.ender_slay: increases damage dealt by %1$s against ender mobs
enchantment.enchantments_plus.enlightenm: increases fog distance by %1$s, increases night vision by %2$s and reduces darkness effect by %2$s
enchantment.enchantments_plus.experience: grants %1$s more xp points when mining blocks or killing entities
enchantment.enchantments_plus.extinguish: reduces Inferno enchantment damage and fire duration by %1$s
enchantment.enchantments_plus.flash.desc: decreases lure time of fishing by at least %1$s and maximal %2$s ticks
enchantment.enchantments_plus.giant_kill: increases damage by %1$s for every percent of health your enemy has above you, up to %2$s
enchantment.enchantments_plus.chilling.d: increases frost by at least §c1§r and max %1$s seconds
enchantment.enchantments_plus.inferno.de: every 10th hit stun your enemy for 5 sec dealing %1$s of your last hit per second
enchantment.enchantments_plus.lightning_: every %1$s hit, strike lightning at your enemy, increasing damage by %2$s
enchantment.enchantments_plus.lumberjack: breaks trees (and other wood) in 1 cut
enchantment.enchantments_plus.magic_prot: such as potions, dragon's breath and sonic booms
enchantment.enchantments_plus.mana_sypho: increases your mana by %1$s of your max mana when hitting an enemy
enchantment.enchantments_plus.overload.d: Decreases Draw Speed by %1$s and grants %2$s Crit Damage. Critical hits have a %3$s chance to deal %4$s more damage
enchantment.enchantments_plus.poisonous_: either increases or adds the poison effect for %2$s ticks
enchantment.enchantments_plus.protective: creates a protective barrier around you freezing projectile
grants a %1$s chance to drop a emerald from mob kills
enchantment.enchantments_plus.snipe.desc: increases damage dealt by %1$s for every 10 blocks travelled
enchantment.enchantments_plus.heavy_plat: decreases move speed by %1$s and grants %2$s armor
enchantment.enchantments_plus.telekinesi: mob and block drops go directly into your inventory
enchantment.enchantments_plus.thorny.des: similar to Thorns just for shields
enchantment.enchantments_plus.transylvan: heals you for amount of entities around you in a %1$s radius, divided by 2
enchantment.enchantments_plus.triple_str: increases damage dealt by %1$s for the first 3 hits on an enemy
enchantment.enchantments_plus.true_prote: decreases damage taken from true damage
enchantment.enchantments_plus.vein_miner: broken blocks will break %1$s adjacent blocks
enchantment.enchantments_plus.wind_bless: gain %1$s more projectile speed and arrows ignore gravity
